INFORMATION

Stack

This site was built with the following stack. Each link directs you to free resources where you can read the documentation.

  • Site Generator: 11ty
  • Frontend: HTML and JavaScript
  • Animations: CSS and GSAP

Coding Resources

  • W3Schools
  • freeCodeCamp
  • MDN Web Docs
  • 11ty Tutorial for Beginners by Kevin Powell
